Post.title: World's highest hotel opens in world's 2nd tallest building in Shanghai
Post.body: The world's highest hotel, J Hotel Shanghai Tower, has opened in the world's second-tallest building, more than 2,000-foot-tall Shanghai Tower. The 165 staterooms and suites of the hotel are located from floors 86 to 98 of the skyscraper. The hotel has a lobby on the 101st floor, while one of the hotel's restaurants is on the 120th floor.
